name: KeyboardEvent.metaKey
description: The KeyboardEvent.metaKey read-only property returning a Boolean that indicates if the Meta key was pressed (true) or not (false) when the event occurred. Some operating systems may intercept the key so it is never detected.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'KeyboardEvent.metaKey' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification.
